aboutMe.description: I'm a passionate Full Stack Developer specializing in building exceptional digital experiences. With experience in modern web technologies, I focus on creating performant, accessible, and visually stunning applications. I love turning complex problems into simple, beautiful solutions.
highlights: Specialized in React, Next.js, and TypeScript
Experience with both startups and enterprise projects
Strong focus on performance and accessibility

experience.title: Senior Frontend Developer
experience.description: Lead frontend development for enterprise applications. Architected scalable systems and improved performance significantly.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: Built and maintained multiple React applications. Implemented design system and component library.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.details: Graduated with honors, focusing on software development and web technologies.

contact.description: I'm currently open to new opportunities and interesting projects. Whether you have a question, want to collaborate, or just want to say hi, I'd love to hear from you!
